description: Obtained by reading first numerator then denominator of fractions in left-hand half of Stern-Brocot tree (A007305/A007306).
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Stern-Brocot or Farey Tree
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
mathematica: Contribution from _Peter Luschny_, Apr 27 2009: (Start)sbt[n_]:=Module[{P,L,Y},P={{1,0},{1,1}};L={{1,1},{0,1}};Y={{1,0},{0,1}}; w[b_]:=Fold[ #1.If[ #2==0,L,P]&,Y,b]; u[a_]:={a[[2,1]]+a[[2,2]],a[[1,1]]+a[[1,2]]}; s[l_]:={l,{Last[l],First[l]}}; Map[s,Map[u,Map[w,Part[Partition[Tuples[{0,1},n],2^(n-1)],1]]]]]Flatten[Append[{1,1},Table[Map[First,sbt[i]],{i,1,5}]]] (End)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 08 2000
